arguments.value: Only client can rate the service

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Allows clients to hire a freelancer and escrow payment
 @param _serviceId ID of the service to hire

@dev Allows client to release payment to freelancer after work completion
 @param _serviceId ID of the service

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only client can rate the service"

arguments.value: Only client can rate the service

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only client can rate the service"

getAverageRating(address).details: Returns the average rating of a freelancer.

returns._0: The average rating as an integer (0 if no ratings present). Note: This returns an integer average with division truncation. For more precise ratings, additional logic could be implemented to return a fixed-point number.

getRatingCount(address).details: Returns the number of ratings received by a certain freelancer.

returns._0: The number of ratings as an integer (0 if no ratings present).

hireFreelancer(uint256).details: Allows clients to hire a freelancer and escrow payment

params._serviceId: ID of the service to hire

offerService(string,uint256).details: Allows freelancers to list their services

rateService(uint256,uint8).details: Allows the client to rate a service (only if payment was released).

params._rating: Service rating value (must be between 1 and 5).
params._serviceId: ID of the service to rate.

releasePayment(uint256).details: Allows client to release payment to freelancer after work completion
